summary: The Coast Guard is investing over $40 billion to replace and update its aircraft and ships. We testified on the Coast Guard's challenges managing this portfolio of major acquisitions. The Coast Guard makes short-term budget decisions without considering costs for longer-term projects, such as a costly backlog of shore infrastructure. Because of this budget approach, the Coast Guard is kicking the can down the road—resulting...
title: Coast Guard Acquisition: Actions Needed to Address Affordability Challenges
